name: Dark Docs 2018
description: A dark theme for the new material design redesign on Google Docs implemented in 2018
additional_info:
Changelog
---

v1.4
* Added a dark theme to Slides
* Coloured all colour important buttons a grey shade. I believe this is the best compromise.
* Coloured all previously uncoloured colour important buttons.
* Corrected apperance of "Present" button in Slides.
! Plan on colouring more things black in slides. This was a quick update that'll polish later.

v1.3.1
* Changed text colour and highlight colour buttons colour to have visible icons. (Not a perfect fix)

v1.3
* Fixed a bug that made it so the buttons were still white.
* Removed rounded corners on document and selection
* Fixed text colour and highlight colour button not displaying any colour. This removes the ability to see the icon unfortunately, but try to remember where they are.
! Planning on making drop-down menus dark too soon. This theme is not dead!

v1.2
* Made background darker to blend it a bit better.

v1.1
* Fixed apperance of "Turn in" button.

v1.0
* Dark Docs Release.

discussions.name: Works well but one issue in control bar
